content: That sounds amazing! I'm really excited to dive into "Who Fears Death" and experience the rich world-building and cultural influences that Nnedi Okorafor has woven together. Since I've just started reading "The Fifth Season" by N.K. Jemisin, I'm already in a fantasy and science fiction mindset, which should make it easy to transition into this new world. By the way, have you heard about the Broken Earth trilogy? I just started reading it today and I'm really enjoying the blend of fantasy and science fiction elements so far.
